entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
